TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WorkflowApplicationEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationEventArgs>도 <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Unloaded%2A> 인스턴스의 <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication> 처리기에 사용됩니다.
## Examples 다음 코드 예제에서는 <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationEventArgs> 인스턴스의 <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Unloaded%2A> 처리기로 전달된 <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication>를 검사하고 언로드된 워크플로의 <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationEventArgs.InstanceId%2A>를 표시합니다.
[!code-csharp[CFX_WorkflowApplicationExample#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/cfx_workflowapplicationexample/cs/program.cs#3)]
